com.nukethemoon.tools.ani

Class AbstractAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nukethemoon.tools.ani.AbstractAnimation

  • public abstract class AbstractAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps to create custom animations.

      • AbstractAnimation

        public AbstractAnimation(int pDurationMillis)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        pDurationMillis - The duration of the animation in milliseconds.

      • AbstractAnimation

        public AbstractAnimation(int pDurationMillis,
                         AnimationFinishedListener pAnimationFinishedListener)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        pDurationMillis - The duration of the animation in milliseconds.
        pAnimationFinishedListener - The finished listener.

    • Method Detail

      • onProgress

        protected abstract void onProgress(float pProgress)
        Implement this method to apply your animation progress.
        Parameters:
        pProgress - The current progress between 0.0 and 1.0.

      • onFinish

        protected abstract void onFinish()
        Implement this method to apply the finish of the animation.

      • onStart

        protected abstract void onStart()
        Implement this method to apply the start of the animation.

      • onLoopStart

        protected abstract void onLoopStart(int pLoopIndex)
        Use this method to implement logic if a loop starts.
        Parameters:
        pLoopIndex - The index of the current loop.

      • computeProgress

        protected float computeProgress()
        Computes the progress of the animation at the current time.
        Returns:
        The progress between 0.0 and 1.0

      • computeIntervalProgress

        public static float computeIntervalProgress(float pProgress,
                                            float pStart,
                                            float pEnd)
        Computes the progress of the progress within the limit os start and end.
        Parameters:
        pProgress - The progress.
        pStart - The start limit.
        pEnd - The end limit.
        Returns:
        the progress or -1.0

      • handleProgress

        protected float handleProgress()
        Computes the current animation progress (0.0 - 1.0) and returns it. Sets the "lastUpdateCallDone" field to true if a 1.0 progress was computed.
        Returns:
        The current animation progress (0.0 - 1.0)

      • start

        public AbstractAnimation start()
        Starts the animation.
        Returns:
        This animation.

      • stopLoop

        public AbstractAnimation stopLoop()
        Stops looping the animation. (After the current run through)
        Returns:
        This animation.

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Returns true if the animation is done. It is only done if the last render call (progress = 1.0) is done.
        Returns:
        true if the animation is done.

      • callAnimationFinishedListeners

        public void callAnimationFinishedListeners()
        Calls the internal AnimationFinishedListener if it is not null. Does not finish the animation.

      • update

        public float update()
        Updates the progress. (Usually called by a animation controller)
        Returns:
        The current progress.

      • addFinishedListener

        public AbstractAnimation addFinishedListener(AnimationFinishedListener pAnimationFinishedListener)
        Adds an animation finished listener. Only creates new list instance if there is more than one listener.
        Parameters:
        pAnimationFinishedListener - A listener that gets called if the animation is finished.
        Returns:
        This animation.

      • hasStarted

        public boolean hasStarted()
        Return true if the animation is started.
        Returns:
        true if the animation is started.

      • getRemainingLoopCount

        public int getRemainingLoopCount()
        Gets the count of remaining loops.
        Returns:
        the count of remaining loops.

      • setLoopLength

        public AbstractAnimation setLoopLength(int pLoopLength)
        Sets the loopLength count.
        Parameters:
        pLoopLength - The count to loopLength.
        Returns:
        This animation.

      • loopInfinite

        public AbstractAnimation loopInfinite()
        Sets an infinite loop for this animation.
        Returns:
        This animation.

      • isLooping

        public boolean isLooping()

      • pause

        public AbstractAnimation pause()
        Pause the animation.
        Returns:
        This animation.

      • resume

        public AbstractAnimation resume()
        Resumes the animation if it is paused.
        Returns:
        This animation.

      • isPaused

        public boolean isPaused()
        Returns true if this animation is paused.
        Returns:
        true if this animation is paused.
